ComicInfo.Title: Mr. Townson's Pizza & Games; Lili: The Demoness; The Ballad of Crying Jack; Lechuza
ComicInfo.Writer: Heath West, Tomasz Witas, Luis Torres
ComicInfo.Penciller: Nestor Tahtiado, Bryan Golden, Marc Oliver, Joseba Morales
ComicInfo.Inker: Nestor Tahtiado, Bryan Golden, Marc Oliver, Joseba Morales
ComicInfo.Summary:
Whispers in Necropolis vol. 1 is the 44 page book that started it all. This book is was our first publication as well as the debut of the successful Lili: the Demoness. This volume also includes stories with a vengeful spirit of a little boy. An abused employee of a pizza restaurant that had reached his breaking point and a legendary half owl; half witch found in Mexican folklore that stalks teens. Picking them off one by one.
Chapters 1. Mr. Townson's Pizza & Games 2. The Ballad of Crying Jack 3. Lili: The Demoness Ch.0 - Deliver the Word 4. Lechuza
